SEARCH
Package com.bteam.fantasychess_client.services

Class ClientGameStateService

java.lang.Object
com.bteam.fantasychess_client.services.ClientGameStateService
public class ClientGameStateService extends Object
Service class that gives access to important gamestate objects

A globally available service class that gives access to the current GridService and a lists of CharacterEntity.
